content.query:
USE demodb
GO
--create masterkey that will protect the credential
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Apps@1234'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL democredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET ='sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2022-08-24T16:48:58Z&st=2022-08-24T08:48:58Z&spr=https&sig=Sm5H%2BnePPYGZlGeIb2rlPwLOoDXS1cuzP8FwJ3DB%2Byo%3D'
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE demodatasource WITH(
    LOCATION ='https://azuredatalakegen2dev.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL =democredential
)
